price: 18. Maalinta (Qiyaamaha) uu Alle soo bixin iyagoo dhan, way u dhaaraan (Alle) siday idiinku dhaartaan9 iyagoo mooda inay wax (xujo ah) heystaan. Hubaal waa iyaga beenaalayaasha.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعٗا فَيَحۡلِفُونَ لَهُۥ كَمَا يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٍۚ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ
footnotes: 9. Waxay moodayaan in beenahooda la rumeysan, oo aan la garan doonin sida waagii nolosha adduunka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma yabʿathuhumu al-lahu jamīʿan fayaḥlifūna lahu kamā yaḥlifūna lakum wayaḥsabūna annahum ʿalā shayin alā innahum humu al-kādhibūna
